questions: Does this landing page feature a clean and modern design? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a hero section on this landing page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the hero section showcase an image of the shampoo bottle? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a catchy headline that says 'Transform Your Hair Today'? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a call-to-action button like 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes, the design uses a minimalistic layout with ample white space and a contemporary color scheme.
yes, the prominent section at the top with a large background image and central text is indicative of a hero section.
yes, the main visual element in the hero section includes images of shampoo bottles.
yes, the text 'Transform Your Hair Today' serves as a compelling slogan aimed at attracting users.
yes, a button labeled 'Learn More' provides a clear next step for user engagement.
yes, all textual elements appear sharp and legible across the design.
